title: Why is the screen too dark or too bright?
answer:
Make sure the light sensor is working properly. Blocking the light sensor can cause problems with brightness levels. 

 On Huawei phones, the option to automatically adjust screen brightness is turned on by default. The brightness level will change by itself according to light in the environment, bringing the brightness to a comfortable level. If you are not satisfied, you can turn off the option to automatically adjust screen brightness and adjust the brightness yourself. 

 If you feel the screen is too bright or dark, adjust the brightness level. Go to Settings > Display > Brightness.

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140219)

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary. 

 If you feel like your screens colors are too cold or too warm, you can adjust color temperature. Go to Settings > Display > Color temperature and de-select Default. Drag the slider to adjust your screen's color temperature. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140220)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140221)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140222)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140223)

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary. 

 Check whether your phone is in Ultra power saving mode. In Ultra power saving mode the screen becomes darker and you can only use the phone, messages, and contacts functions. Touch Exit to turn off Ultra power saving mode. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140224)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140225)

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary. 

 If the screen has received impact damage, the liquid crystal display may be damaged and the screen's brightness level may be affected or the colors may appear abnormal. Contact support or take your phone and proof of purchase to an authorized Huawei service center.
